item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Harvey Nichols Logo Harvey Nichols, founded in 1831, is a British luxury department store chain with a flagship store in Knightsbridge, London. It sells fashion collections for men and women, fashion accessories, beauty products, wine and food, and is owned by Hong Kong luxury goods company Dickson Concepts. Source
You can download theHarvey Nicholslogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: Harvey Nichols
item.description: Harvey Nichols, founded in 1831, is a British luxury department store chain with a flagship store in Knightsbridge, London. It sells fashion collections for men and women, fashion accessories, beauty products, wine and food, and is owned by Hong Kong luxury goods company Dickson Concepts. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Holt Renfrew Logo
Holt, Renfrew & Co., Limited is a Canadian luxury department store chain founded in 1837 by William S. Henderson. It is currently owned by Selfridges Group, through which it is affiliated with the European department stores Selfridges, Brown Thomas, and de Bijenkorf. The chain is comparable to the American department stores Barneys New York, Neiman Marcus, and Saks Fifth Avenue. Once “Furriers in Ordinary” to Queen Victoria, the chain was founded as a fur shop in Quebec City.
You can download theHolt Renfrewlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Holt Renfrew
item.description: Holt, Renfrew & Co., Limited is a Canadian luxury department store chain founded in 1837 by William S. Henderson. It is currently owned by Selfridges Group, through which it is affiliated with the European department stores Selfridges, Brown Thomas, and de Bijenkorf. The chain is comparable to the American department stores Barneys New York, Neiman Marcus, and Saks Fifth Avenue. Once “Furriers in Ordinary” to Queen Victoria, the chain was founded as a fur shop in Quebec City.

Monsoon Accessorize Logo Monsoon Accessorize is a British private limited company. It operates two international retail clothing chains – Monsoon and Accessorize. In 2018, the company reported 181 stores in the UK. Source
You can download theMonsoon Accessorizelogo on full-version of the page. ]] >

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
El Corte Ingles Logo El Corte Inglés S.A., headquartered in Madrid, is the biggest department store group in Europe and ranks third worldwide. El Corte Inglés is Spain’s only remaining department store chain. Source
You can download theEl Corte Ingleslogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: El Corte Ingles
item.description: El Corte Inglés S.A., headquartered in Madrid, is the biggest department store group in Europe and ranks third worldwide. El Corte Inglés is Spain’s only remaining department store chain. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Harrods Logo
Harrods Limited is a department store located on Brompton Road in Knightsbridge, London, England. It is owned by the state of Qatar via its sovereign wealth fund, the Qatar Investment Authority. The Harrods brand also applies to other enterprises undertaken by the Harrods group of companies including Harrods Estates, Harrods Aviation and Air Harrods. The store occupies a 5-acre site and has 330 departments covering 1.1 million sq ft of retail space.
You can download theHarrodslogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Harrods
item.description: Harrods Limited is a department store located on Brompton Road in Knightsbridge, London, England. It is owned by the state of Qatar via its sovereign wealth fund, the Qatar Investment Authority. The Harrods brand also applies to other enterprises undertaken by the Harrods group of companies including Harrods Estates, Harrods Aviation and Air Harrods. The store occupies a 5-acre site and has 330 departments covering 1.1 million sq ft of retail space.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Kmart Logo
Kmart Corporation is an American big box department store chain headquartered in Hoffman Estates, Illinois, United States. The company was incorporated in 1899 as S. S. Kresge Corporation and renamed Kmart Corporation in 1977. The first store with the Kmart name opened in 1962. At its peak in 1994, Kmart operated 2,486 stores globally, including 2,323 discount stores and Super Kmart Center locations in the United States. From 2005 through 2019, Kmart was a subsidiary of Sears Holdings Corporation and is now a subsidiary of Transform SR Brands LLC.
You can download theKmartlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Kmart
item.description: Kmart Corporation is an American big box department store chain headquartered in Hoffman Estates, Illinois, United States. The company was incorporated in 1899 as S. S. Kresge Corporation and renamed Kmart Corporation in 1977. The first store with the Kmart name opened in 1962. At its peak in 1994, Kmart operated 2,486 stores globally, including 2,323 discount stores and Super Kmart Center locations in the United States. From 2005 through 2019, Kmart was a subsidiary of Sears Holdings Corporation and is now a subsidiary of Transform SR Brands LLC.
